p: The in vitro anti-inflammatory action of EEMLR and EEQGL was assessed employing concentration-dependent inhibition against denaturation of egg albumin as followed in Fig. 3. Both EEMLR and EEQGL were expressed cabalistic result 72.9657 ± 0.0011 and 71.5686 ± 0.001 whereas, acetyl salicylic acid was found to be 97.2303 ± 0.0008 at dose 500 μg/ml.
